They managed to take an ok game (dealing with cheaters aside) and turn it into absolute trash. the cheating is so bad and ignored that cheaters will mock you and insist that you report them cause they dont get dealt with. Then you have the match making in competitive that has almost no basis in reality where really low ranking player are getting matched against top tier players making the match unplayable. bottom line if you like your hair and your sanity stay away from this garbage fire of a game. CSGO has also penalized players for kicking toxic teammates. So be prepared to either deal with the toxic teammate or be down a player with no compensation. Atleast the bot actually did something for the team.

So, I love this game, I do. But if you are a woman, or you have an accent, or anything else that would get you discriminated agianst that can be noticed over voice, be very careful. The toxicity of this game is ridiculous. You will have to deal with so much bullshit. 
That said, it is otherwise very good, tho a bit hard to pick up

Update: As I play I think my matchmaking trust factor is increasing. I'm starting to get fewer toxic team mates. I'm having more fun. Solo queue doesn't fill me with anxiety anymore. If this trend keeps up I'll update to a recommend.
